name: Llamageddon
description:
Written for inkJam 2020.

The theme for the jam was "In case of trouble," so I wrote an interactive fiction piece about dealing with an impending disaster by calling in a loose cannon llama who kicks people and spits everywhere.

I hope this will all work as expected, but since I've never written anything using Ink before I can't be absolutely sure. If you find any bugs, please do let me know.
